description.italian: Questo strano masso ha qualcosa di insolito al suo interno.

description.koreana: 이 바위는 기괴하나, 안에는 대단한 것 들었다네.
description.polish: Ten osobliwy głaz skrywa niezwykłą tajemnicę.
description.russian: Внутри этого странного камня есть что-то интересное…
description.schinese: 此石古怪，内藏厉害。
description.spanish: Esta curiosa piedra oculta algo peculiar en su interior.
description.tchinese: 此石古怪，內藏厲害。
description.thai: หินนี้แปลกพิกล ความลับล้นเร้นภายใน
description.turkish: Bu tuhaf kayanın içinde ilginç bir şey var.

displayName.japanese: 六字示すは第十七の難
displayName.thai: เคราะห์ที่ 17 โอม มณี ปัทเม หูม

description.brazilian: Investigue cada cabeça do Buda. Nesta terra perigosa, pedras não faltam.
description.czech: Najdi hlavu každého Buddhy, v této zrádné krajině přebývají kameny.
description.english: Search each Buddha's head; in this perilous land, stones reside.
description.french: Fouillez la tête de chaque Bouddha ; en ces terres dangereuses, des pierres demeurent.
description.german: Ein tiefer Blick in die Augen der Buddhas bringt Steine ans Licht.
description.italian: Ispeziona la testa di ogni Buddha; in questa terra pericolosa risiedono le pietre.
description.japanese: 仏頭探せば石に当たる
description.koreana: 부처 찾아 나섰다가 바위에 부딪혔네.
description.polish: Każdą twarz Buddy zbadaj starannie, w tej groźnej krainie kamienie tkwią nieustannie.
description.russian: Осмотрите головы всех будд — кто знает, какие камни встречаются в этих землях?
description.schinese: 寻遍佛头，撞上石头。
description.spanish: Busca las cabezas de los Budas. En esta peligrosa tierra yacen piedras.
description.tchinese: 尋遍佛頭，撞上石頭。
description.thai: เสาะหาทุกเศียรพระ ปลดปะทะสือก่านตัง
description.turkish: Buddha başlarını ara, dikkat et kaya guailere toslama!

displayName.japanese: 無量の砂塵は第十八の難
displayName.thai: เคราะห์ที่ 18 ฝุ่นทรายกลายอนันต์

description.brazilian: O tigre, a criança, agora são mera lembrança.
description.czech: Tygr a dítě – toť znamení, ve větru oba ztracení.
description.english: The tiger, the child, both lost in the wild.
description.french: Le tigre, l'enfant, tous deux perdus dans le vent.
description.german: Alle beide, Tiger und Kind, tief in der Wildnis verloren sind.
description.italian: La tigre, il bambino, spariti entrambi, lontano o vicino.
description.japanese: 虎も人も、風に舞う塵に同じ
description.koreana: 범과 인간은 바람 속 모래와도 같다지.
description.polish: Tygrys i dziecię, w dziczy zabłąkani, losem połączeni.
description.russian: Тигр и дитя в глуши исчезли без следа.
description.schinese: 虎与人，风里尘。
description.spanish: Entre viento y arena, sin un claro camino, vagan el muchacho y el felino.
description.tchinese: 虎與人，風裡塵。
description.thai: พยัคฆ์แลผู้คน เป็นฝุ่นปนในลมทราย
description.turkish: Kaplan da çocuk da kaybolmuş yabanda.

displayName.japanese: 黄金に導かれるは第十九の難
displayName.thai: เคราะห์ที่ 19 ทองคำนำทาง

description.brazilian: O bêbado disse que há ouro aqui. Você acredita nele?
description.czech: Ten opilec říkal, že je tu zlato. Věříš mu?
description.english: The drunk said there's gold here. Do you believe him?
description.french: L'ivrogne vous a dit qu'il y avait de l'or ici. Est-ce que vous le croyez ?
description.german: Der Trunkenbold versprach hier Gold. Glaubt Ihr ihm?
description.italian: L'ubriaco parla di oro. C'è da credergli?
description.japanese: 酔漢曰く、この地に黄金あり…はてさて
description.koreana: 취옹이 말하기를, 이곳에 황금이 있다던데... 믿겠나?
description.polish: Pijak widział tu złoto. Czy dasz wiarę jego słowom?
description.russian: Пьяница утверждал, что здесь есть золото. Может ли это быть правдой?
description.schinese: 醉酒的家伙说，此地有黄金……你信？
description.spanish: Según el borracho, aquí hay oro. ¿Será cierto?
description.tchinese: 醉酒的傢伙說，此地有黃金……你信？
description.thai: เจ้าคนเมาสุรานั่นบอกว่าที่แห่งนี้มีทองคำ... เจ้าเชื่อหรือ
description.turkish: Ayyaş, burada altın olduğunu söyledi. Ona inanıyor musun?

displayName.japanese: 父子ありしは第二十の難
displayName.thai: เคราะห์ที่ 20 พยัคฆ์สามพ่อลูก

description.brazilian: Os irmãos e o pai. Você encontrou todos.
description.czech: Bratři a jejich otec. Všechny už znáš.
description.english: The brothers and their father. You've met them all.
description.french: Les frères et leur père. Vous les avez tous rencontrés.
description.german: Die Brüder und ihr Vater. Ihr seid ihnen allen begegnet.
description.italian: I fratelli e il padre. Ora li hai conosciuti tutti.
description.japanese: 父、兄、弟。全て降した
description.koreana: 아버지, 형, 아우, 전부 한자리에 모였네.
description.polish: Bracia i ich ojciec. Wszystkich spotkałeś na swej drodze.
description.russian: Отец и сыновья — вы повстречали их всех.
description.schinese: 父，兄，弟，这下都会过了。
description.spanish: Los hermanos y el padre. Ya los has conocido a todos.
description.tchinese: 父，兄，弟，這下都會過了。
description.thai: บิดา พี่ชาย และน้องชาย ครานี้ก็ประมือครบหมดแล้ว
description.turkish: Kardeşler ve babaları... Hepsiyle tanıştın.

displayName.japanese: 砂海に波起きるは第二十一の難
displayName.thai: เคราะห์ที่ 21 ทะเลทรายคลื่นสงบ

description.brazilian: O besouro veio com a batida do tambor e se foi com a onda em ardor.
description.czech: Brouk zvuk bubnů vyslyšel, s něžným pádem vln odešel.
description.english: The beetle came with drumbeats' call, and left with waves' gentle fall.
description.french: Le scarabée répondit à l'appel des tambours battants, et partit au son des vagues s'échouant doucement.
description.german: Der Trommeln Lied rief den Käfer; mit dem Gesang der Wellen entschläft er.
description.italian: Con il richiamo del tamburo lo scarabeo arrivò, e con la dolce caduta delle onde se ne andò.
description.japanese: 鼓に虫寄せられれば、波音と共に去ぬ
description.koreana: 북소리 따라온 벌레, 파도 소리 따라가네.
description.polish: Żuk przybył z bębnów grzmotem, odszedł zaś z fal cichym szelestem.
description.russian: Явился жук под барабанов бой, а что осталось — то ушло с волной.
description.schinese: 虫随鼓声来，又随浪声去。
description.spanish: El escarabajo entre redobles llegó y con las olas suavemente se marchó.
description.tchinese: 蟲隨鼓聲來，又隨浪聲去。
description.thai: ฟู่ป่านตามเสียงกลองปรากฏมา สิ้นชีวาตามเสียงคลื่นกลืนหายไป
description.turkish: Böcek geldi davulun sesiyle ve gitti dalgaların nazik düşüşüyle.

displayName.japanese: 得難き金丹は第二十二の難
displayName.thai: เคราะห์ที่ 22 โอสถทองแสนสามัญ

description.brazilian: Onde há fumaça, há fogo. E, onde há fogo, há pílulas.
description.czech: Ve výhni je oheň a v ohni jsou pilulky.
description.english: In furnace there is fire, and in fire there are pills.
description.french: Dans les fourneaux, il y a du feu, et dans le feu, il y a des pilules.
description.german: Im Ofen brennt Feuer und im Feuer liegen Pastillen.
description.italian: Nella fornace c'è il fuoco e nel fuoco ci sono le pillole.
description.japanese: 炉に火あれば、火に丹あり
description.koreana: 연단로엔 불이, 불 속엔 단약이.
description.polish: W ogniu pieca kryją się cudowne tabletki.
description.russian: В горниле бушует пламя, а в пламени лежат пилюли.
description.schinese: 炉里有火，火里有丹。
description.spanish: En la fragua hay fuego, y en el fuego hay píldoras.
description.tchinese: 爐裡有火，火裡有丹。
description.thai: ในเตามีเพลิงไฟ ในเพลิงไซร้มีหยูกยา
description.turkish: Fırında ateş, ateşte hap vardır.

displayName.japanese: 吹き荒ぶ風は第二十三の難
displayName.thai: เคราะห์ที่ 23 วายุกระโชก

description.brazilian: Sábios continuarão a existir enquanto a fonte permitir.
description.czech: Mudrců bude ještě víc, pokud k tomu jejich tvůrce má co říct.
description.english: There will be more sages if their maker still engages.
description.french: Plus de sages il y aurait, si leur créateur toujours régnait.
description.german: Besteht noch die Quelle, folgen mehr Weise auf der Stelle.
description.italian: Altri saggi la terra ospiterà se il loro creatore ancora vivrà.
description.japanese: 盗人死さず、聖人止まらず
description.koreana: 도적떼가 죽지 않는 이상, 성인들도 멈추지 않을 것이지.
description.polish: Mędrców przybędzie, gdy ich stwórca nadal przędzie.
description.russian: Вновь родится сей мудрец, коль решит его творец.
description.schinese: 大盗不死，圣人不止。
description.spanish: Habrá sabios por doquier si las raíces no haces desaparecer.
description.tchinese: 大盜不死，聖人不止。
description.thai: มหาโจรมิอาสัญ นักปราชญ์นั้นมิเลิกรา
description.turkish: Yaratıcıları olduğu sürece daha çok bilge ortaya çıkar.

displayName.japanese: 千里の報国は第二十四の難
displayName.spanish: La misión de las mil millas
displayName.thai: เคราะห์ที่ 24 พันลี้นี้เพื่อแคว้น

description.brazilian: A viagem foi longa, mas a morte veio sem delonga.
description.czech: Ach běda, ach běda, dlouhá cesta konce nedá.
description.english: Oh woe, oh woe, long trails they did go.
description.french: Ô tant de malheurs, subis par ce voyageur.
description.german: Weh, o weh, die lange Reise so zäh.
description.italian: Oh, come la sventura piombò su chi quel lungo cammino affrontò.
description.japanese: 哀れや哀れ、鼠の里からはるばると…
description.koreana: 가엾다, 가여워, 쥐 마을에서 그리도 오래 걸어왔거늘...
description.polish: Ach, cóż za żal, podróż zawiodła go w dal.
description.russian: Печально закончился путь далёкий — не вернулся домой странник одинокий.
description.schinese: 可怜可怜，鼠村走来这么远……
description.spanish: Qué calamidad aconteció a quien tan larga travesía recorrió.
description.tchinese: 可憐可憐，鼠村走來這麼遠……
description.thai: เวทนา เวทนา จากหมู่บ้านหนูมาไกลถึงเพียงนี้...
description.turkish: Dere tepe gitti heyhat, bitmedi bu seyahat.

displayName.japanese: 妙音鎮めるは第二十五の難
displayName.thai: เคราะห์ที่ 25 เสียงอัศจรรย์เงียบงัน

description.brazilian: Olhos vermelhos marcam cânticos errados. A escritura precisa de correções.
description.czech: Rudé oči značí zaříkávání špatné. Písmo je třeba přepsat, aby bylo platné.
description.english: Red eyes mark wrong chants. The scripture needs amends.
description.french: Les yeux rouges dénotent de terribles chants. Les textes sacrés doivent être modifiés.
description.german: Lässt die Schrift Euch rotsehen, muss sie berichtigt werden.
description.italian: Gli occhi rossi segnano errori nei canti. Servono correzioni alla scrittura.
description.japanese: 聞けば紅眼なる経など、まともではない
description.koreana: 경을 듣다 보니 눈이 싯뻘개지는 것이, 분명 문제 있는 경일 것이야.
description.polish: Czerwone oczy zdradzają błędne pieśni. Pismo święte wymaga korekty.
description.russian: Коли глаза покраснели, значит, в писание закралась ошибка.
description.schinese: 听经红眼，必是经儿错了。
description.spanish: Ojos rojos y cantos erróneos.
description.tchinese: 聽經紅眼，必是經兒錯了。
description.thai: ฟังธรรมเนตรแดงพลัน คัมภีร์นั้นผิดแน่นอน
description.turkish: Kızıl gözlünün ilahileri hatalı, tanzim etmeli mantraları.

displayName.japanese: 亢宿災いに見舞われるは第二十六の難
displayName.thai: เคราะห์ที่ 26 คั่งจินฝ่าเคราะห์

description.brazilian: Uma a menos entre as estrelas.
description.czech: Na hvězdné klenbě je nyní o jednoho méně.
description.english: Now one less dwells in the dome of stars.
description.french: Il y a désormais un habitant de moins dans le dôme des étoiles.
description.german: Nun leuchtet einer weniger am Firmament.
description.italian: Una stella in meno dimora nella volta stellata.
description.japanese: かくして斗牛宫からまた一人、星君が消えた
description.koreana: 그때로부터, 두우궁에는 또 한 명의 성군이 적어졌단다.
description.polish: Jeden gwiazdozbiór mniej na nieboskłonie.
description.russian: Одно из созвездий исчезло с небосвода.
description.schinese: 从此，斗牛宫又少了一位星君。
description.spanish: Una muesca menos en la cúpula estelar.
description.tchinese: 從此，鬥牛宮又少了一位星君。
description.thai: นับแต่นั้นมา ตำหนักโต้วหนิวก็สูญเสียเทพดาราไปอีกหนึ่งองค์
description.turkish: Biri daha eksildi yıldız kubbesinden.

displayName.japanese: 苦海に氷張るは第二十七の難
displayName.thai: เคราะห์ที่ 27 ทะเลทุกข์เยือกแข็ง

description.brazilian: Luar na neve, a morte foi breve.
description.czech: Na sněhu večerní světla, zpuchřelost rychle ho smetla.
description.english: Evening light on snow, rigidity ends in woe.
description.french: Neige à la lueur du soir, la rigidité mène au désespoir.
description.german: Abendlicht auf Schnee; Starrheit bringt Weh.
description.italian: Luce che sulla neve scintilla, la freddezza vita più non stilla.
description.japanese: 夕陽に照る剣や、剛過ぎたるは折る
description.koreana: 너무 올곧은 검은 부러지기 마련이지.
description.polish: Wśród śniegu ścieżka światłem wieczornym spowita, sztywność żalem jest przeszyta.
description.russian: Блики на снегу лежат; быстро молнии разят.
description.schinese: 夕照剑辙，过刚则折。
description.spanish: El ocaso ilumina la claridad de la nieve y la rigidez la tragedia promueve.
description.tchinese: 夕照劍轍，過剛則折。
description.thai: สายัณห์ส่องรอยกระบี่ไซร้ แกร่งไปปราชัยง่ายดาย
description.turkish: Akşam ışıkları karların üstünde, sertliğin sonu geldi acı içinde.

displayName.japanese: 亀蛇結ばるは第二十八の難
displayName.thai: เคราะห์ที่ 28 เต่างูพันประสาน

description.brazilian: Morrer é tão ruim quanto viver sozinho.
description.czech: Zemřít je stejně truchlivé jako žít sám.
description.english: To die is as woeful as to live alone.
description.french: Mourir est aussi triste que vivre seul.
description.german: Der Tod ist so bitter wie ein einsames Leben.
description.italian: Morire è triste quanto vivere in solitudine.
description.japanese: 命を落とすは苦なり、生を拾うもまた苦なり
description.koreana: 단명도 고통이요, 홀로 오래 사는 것도 고통이라네.
description.polish: Śmierć jest równie gorzka jak samotne życie.
description.russian: Смерть столь же печальна, как и жизнь в одиночестве.
description.schinese: 殒命是苦，独活亦是苦。
description.spanish: Morir es tan triste como vivir en soledad.
description.tchinese: 殞命是苦，獨活亦是苦。
description.thai: ความตายเป็นทุกข์ อยู่อย่างเดียวดายก็เป็นทุกข์เช่นกัน
description.turkish: Ölmek, yalnız yaşamak kadar acıdır.

displayName.japanese: 画中に乾坤あるは第二十九の難
displayName.thai: เคราะห์ที่ 29 ฟ้าดินสถิตภาพ

description.brazilian: Perto da cabana, o plantio deu frutos. No Reino Tingido, os corações viraram tributos.
description.czech: Plodinám daří se dobře poblíž chýše, do Malované říše jejich srdce patří spíše.
description.english: Near the hut the crops thrive; in the Painted Realm, their hearts lie.
description.french: Près de la hutte, les cultures éclosent ; dans le royaume du Tableau, leurs cœurs reposent.
description.german: Bei der Hütte gedeihen die Felder sogleich; ihre Herzen leben im Gemalten Reich.
description.italian: Vicino alla capanna i raccolti prosperano; nel Regno dipinto i cuori abitano.
description.japanese: 茅屋建てて、田植え花培う。行き来自在な画中を居とす
description.koreana: 초가집과 울타리, 밭 일구고 꽃 심으니, 자유롭기 그지없다, 그림 속이 내 집이네.
description.polish: Przy chacie plony obficie się mnożą; w Malowanym Królestwie dusze swe łożą.
description.russian: У хижины плоды произрастают, в мир нарисованный попасть они желают.
description.schinese: 茅舍篱笆，种田养花，自在来往，画里为家。
description.spanish: Junto a la cabaña los cultivos prosperan; en el Reino Dibujado, sus corazones esperan.
description.tchinese: 茅舍籬笆，種田養花，自在來往，畫裡為家。
description.thai: กระท่อมรอบล้อมรั้ว เพาะปลูกทั่วเลี้ยงดอกไม้ อิสระไปมาได้ ในภาพกลายเป็นบ้านเอย
description.turkish: Ekinler büyür kulübenin etrafında; kalpleri teselli bulur Resim Diyar'da.

displayName.japanese: 神業にて叩き上げるは第三十の難
displayName.thai: เคราะห์ที่ 30 ขัดเกลาพลังเทพ

description.brazilian: "Com fogo, a armadura é refinada. Com provações, a força é turbinada."
description.czech: „V ohni se zbroj zlepšuje; zkouškami síla určuje.“
description.english: "Through fire, armor is refined; through trials, strength is defined."
description.french: « Par le feu, l'armure est perfectionnée ; par les épreuves, la force est révélée. »
description.german: „Feuer starke Rüstung schafft; unter Lasten wächst die Kraft.“
description.italian: "Per il fuoco si affina l'armatura; per le prove si stabilisce chi la dura."
description.japanese: 百度練り鍛えれば精鋼となり、長き戦場に身置けば勇将となる
description.koreana: 백 번의 용련 끝에 정교한 쇠가 나오고, 몇 곱절의 전장 끝에 용장이 생긴다.
description.polish: „W ogniu zbroja się kształtuje; w próbach duch się hartuje”.
description.russian: «Броня закаляется в пламени, а сила — в испытании».

description.brazilian: Longo e curto, longe e perto, cada período tem um ano certo.
description.czech: Daleký a blízký, dlouhý a krátký, po svém čase se vše vrátí zpátky.

description.french: Longue ou courte, près ou loin, chaque vie a son propre destin.

description.italian: Ogni anno ha la sua durata, che sia lunga, corta o scapestrata.

description.tchinese: 消磨日月，生死有緣，長長短短，各有天年。

description.brazilian: Ela nunca verá com ele o mundo além.

description.tchinese: 眼睛生得再多，看的也是俗塵。

description.brazilian: Que estranho encontrar este idoso em todo canto!

description.german: Wie kommt es, dass dieser alte Mann an jeder Ecke wartet?

description.japanese: はて、どこへ行こうとご隠居に会うのは何為れぞ？

description.polish: Jakże osobliwe, spotykać tego starca na każdym kroku!
description.russian: Как странно, что этот старик всё время где-то неподалёку…
description.schinese: 真怪，怎的哪里都能撞见这老头？

description.brazilian: Hah! Um taoísta devoto não deve ser tão elegante!
